title: Orange Switch 6 Team makes Orange Factory Racing spec available to everyone
content:
Orange Bikes have released an all-singing all-dancing build of their mixed-wheel enduro race bike; the Orange Switch 6 Team. This is the bike the Orange Factory Race Team have been slaying EWS tracks on all season. The super tuneable high-end Italian suspension from Formula is the standout highlight of the build. Hereâ€™s team rider, Tom

The post Orange Switch 6 Team makes Orange Factory Racing spec available to everyone appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
